title: Unavailable?
body: I just wanted to know if this was a glitch or not, but the Elementalist Lux skin says it is unavailable. Or is the skin just not even out yet?

replies.body: I don't believe that skin is available currently, but per the[ 6.23 patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-623-notes)is aimed to appear sometime during the patch.  Hang tight until then!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=atFpLQ9a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-22T23:58:27.422+0000)
>
> I don't believe that skin is available currently, but per the[ 6.23 patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-623-notes)is aimed to appear sometime during the patch.  Hang tight until then!

still waiting......

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=atFpLQ9a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-22T23:58:27.422+0000)
>
> I don't believe that skin is available currently, but per the[ 6.23 patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-623-notes)is aimed to appear sometime during the patch.  Hang tight until then!

So....will it be launched a day before or with next patch? :c I recall dark star thresh having been supposed to go live with some patch but instead it came up with the next one. This current pace of hearing announcements that the skins will go live under the patch but still having to wait up to a week feels quite bad .<

I don't really know the details of these things as I'm not part of any skin or marketing teams.  Feel free to ask and share any feedback you have about this over at the [Art ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art)boards.  Good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=atFpLQ9a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-22T23:58:27.422+0000)
>
> I don't believe that skin is available currently, but per the[ 6.23 patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-623-notes)is aimed to appear sometime during the patch.  Hang tight until then!

Ok, thank you.

I've neem asking the same exact question. I was excited to get the elementals skin, I have purchased the RP but it isn't out yet. It's kind of sad they announced it to be released with patch 6.23, but it hasn't been :(
